jcolibri.evaluation
Interface CycleEvaluator

All Known Implementing Classes:
SolutionSimilEvaluator
public interface CycleEvaluator

Interface for the CycleEvaluators.
CycleEvaluators shuold be call in each evaluation step (i.e. cycle). They store internally the evaluation of each cycle and returns the hole information when evaluation has finished with the method getEvaluationResult()

Author:
Juan A. Recio García - GAIA http://gaia.fdi.ucm.es

Method Summary
 void evaluateTraining(CBRContext context)
          This method must be called in each cycle of the evaluation.

          Returns the EvaluationResult when the evaluation has finished
